vulnerabilities.title: Vercelâ€™s AI SDK's filetype whitelists can be bypassed when uploading files
vulnerabilities.description: A vulnerability in Vercelâ€™s AI SDK has been fixed in versions 5.0.52, 5.1.0-beta.9, and 6.0.0-beta. This issue may have allowed users to bypass filetype whitelists when uploading files. All users are encouraged to upgrade.
